RevisedPrescription: Furosemide - Take orally once a day in the morning. Dosage to be determined by the doctor based on your condition.
Iron supplement (e.g., Ferrous sulfate) - Take orally with a glass of water on an empty stomach. It is usually recommended to be taken once or twice daily as prescribed.
Stool softener (e.g., Docusate sodium) - Take orally as directed by your doctor, usually once or twice daily. It is important to drink plenty of water when using this medication.
Antifungal cream (e.g., Clotrimazole) - Apply topically to the affected area according to the instructions provided. Wash hands before and after application.
